summary: After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors says he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.
cast: James Stewart|Richard Attenborough|Peter Finch|Hardy Krüger|Ernest Borgnine|Ian Bannen|Ronald Fraser|Christian Marquand|Dan Duryea|George Kennedy|Gabriele Tinti|Alex Montoya|Peter Bravos|William Aldrich|Barrie Chase|Stanley Ralph Ross
title: El vuelo del Fénix
